channel.title: Server Causing T1's
channel.description:
Hello, I have been having a problem with my ranging, I am using Shard.
When I switch between two ranging weapons (Magic Short and Dark Bow, or Magic Short and Rune Knives, basically any 2 ranged weapons)
I get disconnected and my client CMD write this,
[code]Error: T1 - 102,0 - 34,53[/code] [code]Error: T1 - 96,0 - 218,34[/code]

item.title: Server Causing T1's
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

A good place to start would be where those packets are sent serverside.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Causing T1's
item.dc:creator: @Zoft1 Zoft™
item.description:
@Zoft1 wrote:

Thanks man, yeah they are great.

And I know it’s case 102 and case 96 causing the problems, I just don’t know where to look to fix it because I just started using Shard.

Read full topic

item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

OT: The server is sending a crash frame & an unrecognized packet
